name: Flash Climbing - Game 6
description:
A  game where you experience the excitement of free solo climbing without having to go outside.

How to play:
Hold Q/E/A/D to select a limb, then use the arrow keys to move.

Grab holds and climb the wall. If you lose grip on the wall and fall it is game over.

Project

This is game 6 of the "Make 10 games in 10 weeks" project by Paul from Paul Makes Games. Please leave me some feedback and follow me on my social media below.
